DOC.brief_summary: A 12-month study evaluate clinical experience Sientra 207 Silicone Gel Breast Implants
DOC.brief_title: Post Market Clinical Experience Study Sientra 207 Breast Implants
DOC.criteria: 1 . Is candidate primary revision breast augmentation least 22 year age , 2 . Agrees Sientra study requirement comply office followup visit month 3 , 6 12 . 1 . Does meet Investigator 's standard eligibility breast augmentation revision surgery 2 . Surgeon planning use acellular dermal matrix ( ADM ) surgical mesh and/or recommend postoperative massage .
